channel.title: Comments on: Rise Like Lions, but put the fucking glasses on.
channel.description: Exegesis Hermeneutics Flux Capacitor of Truthiness

item.title: By: So here it is Merry Christmas. BBC Papers Headlines and some Impossible things before Breakfast. ‘Rise like Lions after slumber In unvanquishable number- Shake your chains to earth like dew Which in sleep had fallen on you- Ye are many-they are few.
item.dc:creator: So here it is Merry Christmas. BBC Papers Headlines and some Impossible things before Breakfast. ‘Rise like Lions after slumber In unvanquishable number- Shake your chains to earth like dew Which in sleep had fallen on you- Ye are many-they are few.
